column4: I was considering using photoshop through wine, but I have a feeling it'll be slow on my laptop, so instead of a dual boot--where I'd have to go back and forth between nix and win--Im thinking wubi would be the best way to go, dunno
you may also consider gimp (heresy I know) or !VirtualBox
edbian thx, will look into virtualbox
I just realized I had used virtualbox on my laptop before to run nix and it seemed really slow
